Text:
Hi,
      Thanks for all the great downloads. I was wondering why on this one show is it one week behind. Normally they are right on line with the networks. Last week 6/14 was on the air but 6/13 was being uploaded. This week 6/15 is on the air but 6/14 is being uploaded. Can you help with this problem?  Thanks John  johnsolgot@yahoo.com
for some reason all the episodes for this season have been mislabelled. this is episode fifteen "aubrey's shower"
Hi again I found out that just the numbers are off. The episode is the current one. thanks for all you do. John
Hi I found out just the numbers are off. The episode is the current one. Thanks  John

.
